name: Conjuration
description: Summons and teleports creatures and objects.

name: Divination
description: Reveals information, predicts the future, and reads minds.

name: Enchantment
description: Charms, influences, and curses sentient creatures.

name: Evocation
description: Creates and controls elemental and magical forces.

name: Illusion
description: Generates false images and sensory deceptions.

name: Necromancy
description: Manipulates life, death, and the undead

name: Transmutation
description: Transforms matter and alters physical properties.
